name: T - Family Talk
_source: speak;Emma; Do I want to spend the evening with Emily and Mom?
speak;Emily; Man{tgm}...{tgm}the stars are so bright tonight.{w} They're like a bunch of little suns.{w} And they connect together in these cool little pictures.{w} I think I can even see a pegasus!
speak;Emma; I don't think I have the heart to tell her what the sun is...;;;thought_bubble;no_talk

speak;Caroline; Girls, I'm sorry that your first experience traveling outside of home is so{tgm}...{tgm}hard.{w} The last thing I wanted was for your first impression of the world to be so negative,{w} but it might be too late for that{tgm}...
speak;Emily; It's not like you can protect us from the whole world.{w} We were gonna see how crappy it was at some point anyway.
speak;Caroline; I would've rather shown you the nice parts before jumping into the grime and war.
speak;Emma; If you just focus on the bad, of course the world's going to seem bad.{w} There's got to be some life in all of the strife, though, right?
speak;Emily; Don't act like such a child, Emma.{w} It can't be that simple.
speak;Emma; If only children think of peace,{w} maybe we should look from a child's point of view,{w} instead of that of a sentry tower.
speak;Emily; It's just not how the world works!
speak;Caroline; Maybe you're both right.{w} It doesn't take a genius to know that war, stealing, and kiling is wrong,{w} but the world isn't going to set down its arms all at once.
speak;Emily; I still think Emma's view is unrealistic.
speak;Emma; Would it kill you to see my point of view?!
speak;Emily; Fine, I'll agree with you when you can answer me one question.
speak;Emily; In your perfect world, how are you going to keep people from fighting each other?{w} How will you beat the game of war, where nobody forgets a single move you've made?
speak;Caroline; Maybe we shouldn't worry about the world at large.{w} We're here, right now, under the night sky.
speak;Emily; The stars in the sky are beautiful no matter where you see them from.
speak;Emma; Was that{tgm}...{tgm}a positive comment?{w} From <bconvo>my</> sister?
speak;Emily; Oh, shut up and enjoy it.
speak;Emma; Maybe Mom is right.{w} Maybe this is enough...;;;thought_bubble;no_talk
